flickbase

Flickbase simulates a streaming website. It offers a library with the most popular filmes and television series using The Movie DB API.
Technologies used: React, Typescript, Tailwind v2.2.16, FontAwesome, React Slick, The Movie DB v3 API, and EventEmitter from Facebook.
